tests.result: Low injury risk detected with 94% confidence

tests.result: High grit indicators detected in facial expressions

tests.result: High competitive drive detected through micro-expressions

tests.description: Test overall system processing speed

tests.result: Memory usage within acceptable limits (45MB peak)
